text: to jab ye apana idda poora karane ke kareeb pahunche to ya tum unhen unavaane shaista se rok lo ya achchhee tarah rookhasat hee kar do aur (talaaq ke vakt) apane logon mein se do aadilon ko gavaah qaraar de lo aur gavaahon tum khuda ke vaaste theek theek gavaahee dena in baaton se us shakhsh ko naseehat kee jaatee hai jo khuda aur roje aaakherat par eemaan rakhata ho aur jo khuda se darega to khuda usake lie najaat kee soorat nikaal dega
